text: Argyros (, from the Greek word for "silver"), Latinized as Argyrus, can refer to: * Argyros (Byzantine family), prominent Byzantine noble clan * Argyrus (Catepan of Italy) (died 1068), Byzantine general of Lombard origin * Isaac Argyros (born 1312), Byzantine mathematician * Billy Argyros, Greek-Australian professional poker player * George Argyros (born 1937), Greek-American ambassador and businessman * The fictional character Basil Argyros == See also == * Argyropoulos Category:Greek-language surnames
title: Argyros
